title: Stone Tower (5R39)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Vitality:	-2
Game Text:	Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert 2 [Gondor] Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.
Lore:	The battlements of Osgiliath provided some defense against Sauron's attackers.
Rarity:	R
